title: Charles River Apparel Men's Boston Flight Jacket
features: Snap closure pockets to secure valuables
Modern silhouette with rib knit detailing on hem, collar and cuffs
Full zip jacket with 100 percent nylon lining
description: The men's Boston flight jacket is a fresh take on the classic bomber jacket. This fashion-forward product is wind and water-resistant, and made of soft river Tec nylon taffeta. It is fully lined with lightweight nylon. It is available in several colors and sizes, and it will look great no matter the season. Customize with an imprint of your brand logo to maximize corporate exposure on a cool jacket.
